title: ASUS introduces the ROG Flow X16 and Strix Scar 17 Special Edition
content:
ASUS’ ROG brand has just introduced a pair of new gaming laptops, geared towards distinct audiences – the “lightweight” ASUS ROG Flow X16 and the extra-powerful ASUS ROG Strix Scar 17 Special Edition. The latter is a more powerful edition of the existing ROG Strix Scar 17, now featuring Intel’s extra powerful HX series processors,

The post ASUS introduces the ROG Flow X16 and Strix Scar 17 Special Edition appeared first on XDA.
description: ASUS ROG has announced a couple of new gaming laptops - the ROG Flow X16 convertible and the extra-powerful ROG Strix Scar 17 SE.
